title: Interop Resource Retrieve
description: This event represents the Resource as retrieved from a client EMR by the Interops process.

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant for which the resource was retrieved

fhirId.description: The FHIR ID associated to this resource. It should also be present in the JSON representation.

resourceJson.description: The JSON string representation of the FHIR resource that was retrieved.
